main event: Two spherical objects were observed in the sky over Thousand Hills State Park, Missouri on August 20, 1967.
interesting points: The objects were initially described as metallic, disc-shaped before appearing spherical,The sighting lasted for approximately 2-3 minutes,No sound was associated with the objects,The objects changed altitude during the sighting,Several witnesses reported conflicting details about the shape of the objects.
location: Thousand Hills State Park, Missouri, USA
witness description: The witnesses provided varying descriptions, with some claiming to see shapes that were metallic and disc-like, while others described them as spherical.
